name: API3
challengeDesc: Project that is judged most likely to attract the largest user adoption or show the greatest commercial viability.
benefitIntro: Our team has transitioned from 3rd-party API services like Chainlink to API3's Beacons, in order to better secure our platform's data integrations.
benefit1: Offer a much greater assurance against data errors.
benefit2: Real-time data notifications, with an integration to Ava's Push Notification Service (APNS.io).
benefit3: Encourage the need for 'Verifiable' Transparency of the data being presented to users.
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with API3.
